tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Hi Everyone,

Greetings...

I was recommended a Total Hip Replacement Surgery in July 2019, due to some past injury commonly known as AVN (Avascular Necrosis). I had great difficulties walking, sitting, lying down & even travelling. Walking was very embarrassing, coz I had developed a limp gradually without realizing.  I had to quit my work due, in ability to travel.

After consulting several surgeons in Bangalore, I was referred to Dr Sharath in Ramaiah Hospital. He was very kind and offered to consult, though it was not his day for Consultation.

He just went through my X-ray, immediately gave me a date for admission and surgery. And said very confidently, these exact words “I’ll fix it”.

I went through the surgery in Ramaiah Hospital on the 31st of August 2019. And he kept his word, fixed me both physically & mentally. I recovered swiftly, comparatively and doing great since September 2019. I’m back to my regular life and activities, I didn’t go through any kind of post operative pain or stress or physiotherapy just followed up with the recommended out patient consultations and care.

Dr. Sharath K Ramanath in his “Profession is Perfection @ it’s BEST”.

I wish him well with his Future Accomplishments.


Regards
Rabi
*** **** *** *** ***** *********

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Very brilliant doctor. I visited many hospitals for my joint swelling and pains. He diagnosed my seronegative Rheumatoid Arthritis through MRI . He suggested immediately a good Rhumatoligist . Now I am slowly recovering. Thank you doctor for diagnosing the problem.

My father was not able to walk due to a condition called ankylosing spondylitis.  His both hip s were fused. 
He was having severe pain. Dr sharath performed both hip replacement surgery of my father.
Now he is able to fold the  hips and pain free. Surgery is successful. 
Thanks to Dr sharath sir.
** **  *** **** *** ********** ** *** *********** *** **** *** ** **** ****** Many many thanks....

I had hip replacement where Doctor asked my queries and operated me in the right way.Operation which was very successful and very satisfied.Doctor treated me very well.I strongly recommend this Doctor since he takes take care of his patients very well.

review: I took my wife for knee pain treatment. It was diagnosed that the pain was due to muscular problem and accordingly medication prescribed for 10 days.  The is getting reduced after 2nd day of medication.
